txt.en:
'The hunters must be dealt with now. Their traps cannot be permitted in this wood, for it is against our law.

'Please, go and destroy all the traps you find, good [placeholder], as you did with the fishermen's nets. All creatures must die, but none should die locked in a cage or choked in a snare.

'I must warn you again, though... do not be seen.'

'That was a good deed, [placeholder]. You have been helpful to our little watch-post here, though I am sure Thinglad is drear compared to the fair mallorns of LÃ³rien.\n\n'Nevertheless, I will defend this wood, though it lacks the beauty of the greater forest.'
'The traps can be found in the northern parts of these woods. You should avoid being spotted by the hunters while you roam.'
Noriel does not permit trapping in the forest of Thinglad and wants the Rohirrim traps removed.
Traps can be found on the north-western edge of Thinglad's trees, set by the huntsmen of Stangard.\n\nYou should destroy the traps, for they are not permitted in the Elf-lands.
Noriel is awaiting you in Thinglad's Elf-keep of Haldirith.\n\nYou should return to Noriel, now that you have destroyed the unlawfully-placed traps.
